notification_template.name: Уведомление о создании/изменении мероприятия
notification_template.subject: Уведомление о создании/изменении мероприятия
notification_template.body:
<% //---------------------------------- // часовой пояс времени, указываемого в параметрах карточки мероприятия, // если параметр отрицательный укажите (0-X), где X - число часов [десятичная дробь] BASE_TIME_ZONE = 3; //---------------------------------- teOrganizerObject = OpenDoc( UrlFromDocID( OptInt( objDocID ) ) ).TopElem; teEvent = objDoc; // переопределим для удобства чтения file_id=String(teEvent.id).slice(String(teEvent.id).length-6); sOrganizerFullname = teOrganizerObject.fullname; sOrganizerEmail = teOrganizerObject.email; sSubject = Text; sComment = teEvent.comment; sParticipantEmail = ""; sParticipantData = ""; bCanceled = (objDocSecID == null) sSender = sOrganizerFullname + " <" + sOrganizerEmail + ">" html_text = ""; text=""; month = Month(teEvent.plan_start_date) if(Month(teEvent.plan_start_date) < 10) { month = '0' + StrInt(Month(teEvent.plan_start_date)) } day = Day(teEvent.plan_start_date) if(Day(teEvent.plan_start_date) < 10) { day = '0' + StrInt(Day(teEvent.plan_start_date)) } // START start_hour = StrRangePos(teEvent.start_time, 1,2) if(StrRangePos(teEvent.start_time, 1,2) < 10) { start_hour = '0' + StrRangePos(teEvent.start_time, 1,2) } start_minute = StrRangePos(teEvent.start_time, 3,5) START_TIME= StrInt(Year(teEvent.plan_start_date)) + month + day + 'T' + start_hour + start_minute // FINISH end_hour = StrRangePos(teEvent.end_time, 1,2) if(StrRangePos(teEvent.end_time, 1,2) < 10) { end_hour = '0' + StrRangePos(teEvent.end_time, 1,2) } end_minute = StrRangePos(teEvent.end_time, 3,5) END_TIME = StrInt(Year(teEvent.plan_start_date)) + month + day + 'T' + end_hour + end_minute if(sComment != "") { html_text += "

Описание к событию

"; html_text += "

" + sComment +"

"; } html_text += "

________________________________________________________________________________

"; html_text += "

START_TIME - " + START_TIME + "

"; html_text += "

END_TIME - " + END_TIME + "

"; html_text += "

Звонок в WebSoft WorkSpace


"; html_text += "Щелкните здесь, чтобы присоединиться к звонку"; html_text += "

P.S. Пока работает только на компьютере

"; html_text += "

________________________________________________________________________________

" for(participant in teEvent.block_participant.participants) { teParticipantObject = OpenDoc( UrlFromDocID( OptInt( participant.person_id ) ) ).TopElem; sParticipantEmail += teParticipantObject.fullname +' <'+teParticipantObject.email+'>,'; sParticipantData += 'ATTENDEE;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;PARTSTAT=ACCEPTED;CN=' + teParticipantObject.lastname + ' ' + teParticipantObject.firstname + ';RSVP=FALSE:mailto:' + teParticipantObject.email + '\r\n'; } RSVP_STR='FALSE'; DT_START = START_TIME; DT_END = END_TIME; DT_STAMP = ''; UID = StrHexInt(teEvent.id)+"-WebSoft_Generated" sMessageBody = ' To: '+sParticipantEmail+' Subject: '+sSubject+' MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="=_mixed 004128EAC32576F1_=" X-Spam: Not detected X-Mras: Ok X-Mailru-Src: mxpdd X-Mras: Ok X-Mailru-Intl-Transport: d,ed4f05e This is a multipart message in MIME format. --=_mixed 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="=_related 004128EAC32576F1_=" --=_related 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="=_alternative 004128EAC32576F1_=" --=_alternative 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8 '+text+' --=_alternative 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Content-Disposition: inline '+html_text+' --=_alternative 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: text/calendar; method=REQUEST; charset=utf-8; BEGIN:VCALENDAR VERSION:2.0 PRODID:-//WebSoft LTD//WebSoft 2//EN METHOD:REQUEST BEGIN:VEVENT DTSTART:'+START_TIME+' DTEND:'+END_TIME+' DTSTAMP:'+DT_STAMP+' TRANSP:OPAQUE SEQUENCE:0 CLASS:PUBLIC SUMMARY:'+teEvent.name+' ORGANIZER;CN='+teOrganizerObject.fullname+':mailto:'+teOrganizerObject.email+'\n '+sParticipantData+' UID:'+UID+' LOCATION: BEGIN:VALARM TRIGGER:-P1D DURATION:PT15M ACTION:DISPLAY DESCRIPTION:'+sComment+' X-WR-ALARMUID:646DBD0737BC5B52 END:VALARM END:VEVENT END:VCALENDAR --=_alternative 004128EAC32576F1_=-- --=_related 004128EAC32576F1_= --=_related 004128EAC32576F1_=-- --=_mixed 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: text/calendar; method=REQUEST; charset=utf-8; name="c766867.ics" Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="c766867.ics" BEGIN:VCALENDAR VERSION:2.0 PRODID:-//WebSoft LTD//WebSoft 2//EN METHOD:REQUEST BEGIN:VEVENT DTSTART:'+START_TIME+' DTEND:'+END_TIME+' DTSTAMP:'+DT_STAMP+' TRANSP:OPAQUE SEQUENCE:0 CLASS:PUBLIC SUMMARY:'+teEvent.name+' DESCRIPTION:'+sComment+' ORGANIZER;CN='+teOrganizerObject.fullname+':mailto:'+teOrganizerObject.email+'\n UID:'+UID+' LOCATION: BEGIN:VALARM TRIGGER:-P1D DURATION:PT15M ACTION:DISPLAY DESCRIPTION:'+sComment+' X-WR-ALARMUID:646DBD0737BC5B52 END:VALARM END:VEVENT END:VCALENDAR --=_mixed 004128EAC32576F1_=-- ' %> <%if ( bCanceled == true ) {%> Мероприятие "<%=teEvent.name%>" было отменено организатором <%=teOrganizerObject.fullname%> <%} else {%> <%=sMessageBody%> <%}%>
